title: [RIDGELINE] Launching Japanese Kissa by Kissa
content:
Ridgeline subscribers —
I was confused, I was exhausted, I was operating on autopilot. I mean, this was to be expected. I was in Morioka to launch Kissa by Kissa’s Japanese edition and it was my tenth interview (!!) in two days (with ten more to follow) and it was sort of early (for me) and I had shoved all of these new Japanese phrases into my head in attempt to more clearly articulate why this or why that.
